chunks.chunk_text: 歡迎收聽啟稟老師的超級英語通
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 辦公英語通I cant get the printer to work. 我的印表機動不了了.......json

chunks.chunk_text: 大家好,我是啟稟老師,我們先來看看有誰在我身上。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 辦公英語通I cant get the printer to work. 我的印表機動不了了.......json

chunks.chunk_text: Conversation 實用對話I can't get the printer to work.Is the power on? Did you check the papers?That's the first thing I checked. What should I do now?You have two options. Kick it until it works or beg it to work again.Yeah, very funny.Just kidding, man. You should call the technician. He'll fix it for you.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 辦公英語通I cant get the printer to work. 我的印表機動不了了.......json

chunks.chunk_text: 怎麼辦?印表機動不了了。這個在辦公室裡面最常遇到的問題不是印表機啦,就是影印機。我們最害怕就是這些東西動不了。那麼英文就可以說I can't get the printer to work.我沒有辦法讓印表機運作work。這個是一個動詞,表示是機器的運作、運行、順利的動作的意思。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 辦公英語通I cant get the printer to work. 我的印表機動不了了.......json

chunks.chunk_text: I can't get the printer to work.I can't get the copying machine to work.I can't get the copying machine to work.

chunks.chunk_text: Is the power on? Is the power off?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 辦公英語通I cant get the printer to work. 我的印表機動不了了.......json

chunks.chunk_text: That's the first thing I checked.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 辦公英語通I cant get the printer to work. 我的印表機動不了了.......json

chunks.chunk_text: 後面加上主詞跟動詞就代表說這是我第一件做的事。比如說那是我早上第一件做的事。That's the first thing I did in the morning.比如說他是我第一個打電話的人。He's the first one I called.都可以用這個first名詞後面再加一個主詞動詞的句法。What should I do now?
